amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to add an analysis of succession planning and hiring in rural areas, and requires a study on the ability to hire and recruit veterans in rural areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Welch.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
